event.name: ENCOUNTER_SIREN_UNKNOWN
event.text: Before you even have time to react, a foreign vessel comes barreling towards you! You've never seen or heard of a ship like this, but you don't have time to question it, get ready to fight!

event.name: SIREN_UNKNOWN_ESCAPING
event.text: Whatever these aliens are - looks like they aren't above traditional cowardice. Scans show their FTL drive has been powered up and they're now trying to escape!

event.name: SIREN_UNKNOWN_GOTAWAY
event.text: The mysterious alien vessel has escaped into the abyss. You can't linger around for long, but maybe some day you'll see these things again.
